welcome_message_body: "Welcome to The Colony, where Southern charm meets modern convenience! Known for its beautiful parks and scenic lake views, we invite you to explore our city and its unique attractions. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport is primarily used by American Airlines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport serves as a hub for American Airlines and its regional partners, as well as a few international carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Terminal C at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport is primarily used by American Airlines and its regional partners, as well as a few international carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: Terminal D at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport is the airport's international terminal, serving a variety of international carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: Terminal E at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport is primarily used by American Airlines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: Terminal F at Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport is currently under construction and is expected to open in 2025.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Love Field Airport serves all domestic flights and houses a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Southwest Airlines Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to Southwest Airlines and offers a convenient and efficient experience for their passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Redbird Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for executive and private flights at Redbird Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
